channel.title: Bank Transfer
channel.description:
Coon has been helping me with a Money storage system for my server and all it needs is a way to transfer money from 1 char to another..
the money saves as character-vault = #
they type ::add # and it adds the ammount to their vault and removes from inven they do ::take # and it removes the ammount from their vault and adds to inven i need a ::send # playername to remove from 1 players vault and into another __________________ player 1 has 10k he wants to give to player 2
player 1 types | ::give 10000 player 2
and it will take 10000 out of player 1's char file and add it to player 2's

item.title: Bank Transfer
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

Coon has been helping me with a Money storage system for my server and all it needs is a way to transfer money from 1 char to another…

the money saves as character-vault = #

they type ::add # and it adds the ammount to their vault and removes from inven
they do ::take # and it removes the ammount from their vault and adds to inven
i need a ::send # playername to remove from 1 players vault and into another

player 1 has 10k he wants to give to player 2

player 1 types | ::give 10000 player 2

and it will take 10000 out of player 1’s char file and add it to player 2’s
